Sipna College of Enginnering And Technology, Amravati

Event Name : Circuit-Fixer Challenge

Date and Time : 8th February 2024

Location : Sipna College for Engineering And Technology, Amravati

Competition Categories :

i) Group A: B.E. 1st Year/11th and 12th Students/Diploma Students
ii) Group B: B.E. 2nd/3rd/Final Year Students/B.Sc./M.Sc. Students

Syllabus :

  • 1) Basic Electrical Engineering
  • 2) Basics of Digital Electronics
  • 3) Electronic Devices & Circuits
  • 4) Communication Engineering

Coordinators :

  • 1) Mr.Prathamesh More : +918421334187
  • 2) Mis.Asmita Mahajan : +919834916081
  • 3) Mr.Lalit Donode : +918999759354
  • 4) Mis.Kalyani Bansod : +917385949327

Rules & Regulations

  • 1. Participants must arrive on time for the test.
  • 2. Valid ID cards from respective institutes and registration receipts are mandatory.
  • 3. Hardware for the final round will be provided by the organizers.
  • 4. Decisions of judges and organizers are final and binding.
  • 5. Answer papers for rounds 1 and 2 will not be shown, and results are binding.
  • 6. Teams requiring assistance should approach event coordinators/organizers.
  • 7. Maximum 2 members per team.
